short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Channel i is built around the idea that you must be close to what you need. Stay close, Stay updated.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Pocket Channel-I!

Now accessing your intranet applications and staying in sync with Channel-I is easier than ever before!
